title: Splinter Cell Reveal Is Just A Joke   - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.15.19
description:
Robinhood is giving listeners a free stock at http://games.robinhood.com

Get 10% off your first order with promo code: GAMES at http://brooklinen.com

Tim and Gary go over the latest Ubisoft, Konami, and Last of Us 2 news.

Time Stamps - 
00:04:06 - Housekeeping
Today at 3PM Pacific Mario Maker 2 Direct
The Kinda Funny Games E3 Showcase is June 10th at 4:30 p.m. PT! Youtube.com/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:Tom Bock, Black Jack, and Mohammed Mohammed.
The Roper Report   -
00:05:08 - Ubisoft Splinter Cell Joke
00:13:52 - The Division 2 Raid Won’t Have Matchmaking (Stephen Totillo Kotaku)
00:21:20 - The Last of Us 2 Is in Its FInal Stages of Development (Alex Avard) Gamesradar)
00:23:26 - PlayStaion Hiring Event Manager (Sillegamer: ResetEra)
00:29:15 - Netflix at E3 (Janet Garcia IGN)
00:32:05 - Konami Just Had It’s Most Profitable Year Ever
00:37:25 - Out today
00:39:45 -  Robinhood
00:40:50 - Brooklinen
Reader mail   -
00:42:17 - What's the game that made you a gamer? What I mean by this is what's the game that turned gaming from a hobby into a passion? - Alec Bobko
00:47:25 - Since most cell providers now offer an unlimited option for phones, what’s holding Sony and Xbox back from allowing game streaming from my consoles at home to my phone? - Dante the clerk
00:50:24 - Squad Up: Alfonso (Xbox One) - Speaks Beliefs
00:51:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Fran and Tim
